sentences.english: You control pitch and roll with the accelerometer.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過重力感應控制飛機俯衝和爬升。

sentences.english: The positive and negative charges are then separated by updrafts and gravity, producing the electric field.
sentences.chinese: 正負電荷受上升氣流與重力的影響而分離，產生電場。

sentences.english: Gravitropism of higher plants is one of the fundamental adoptive responses upon environmental stimuli.
sentences.chinese: 重力反應是植物對環境的一種適應現象。

sentences.english: Euclidean quantum gravity applies the superposition principle to the entire universe.
sentences.chinese: 歐氏量子重力將疊加原理套用到整個宇宙。

sentences.english: High order, high precision geopotential models have broad application.
sentences.chinese: 高階高精度地球重力場模型具有廣泛的用途。

sentences.english: Also provided a powerful safeguard for the gravity quay construction of large caisson.
sentences.chinese: 也爲大型沉箱結構重力式碼頭建設提供了有力的保障。

sentences.english: The gravity of Prometheus periodically creates streamer-channels in the F ring.
sentences.chinese: 普羅米修斯重力在F環週期性形成流光通道。

sentences.english: The stone rolled down the mountain by gravity.
sentences.chinese: 這塊石頭由於重力作用而滾下山。

sentences.english: Hence, it was shown that there existed obvious systematic error of gravimeter calibration.
sentences.chinese: 這表明重力儀格值存在着明顯的系統誤差。

sentences.english: Another example of the gravity arch dam, this one has a crest of almost eleven hundred meters in length.
sentences.chinese: 這又是一座重力拱壩，頂部長達1100多米。

sentences.english: In running, as in all other movement, it is all about gravity.
sentences.chinese: 跑步時，就如其他所有的動作，全與重力有關。

sentences.english: You cannot walk up against gravity.
The next parameter is the direction and speed of gravity.
sentences.chinese: 下一個參數是重力的大小和方向。

sentences.english: The remark about the successes and prospects in regional gravity survey is given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文就地礦部區域重力調查成果與展望，予以論述。

sentences.english: Foam can retard gas channeling and gravity override in gas flooding.
sentences.chinese: 泡沫劑可以減緩氣驅中的氣竄和重力超覆現象。

sentences.english: In normal staccato, gravity quickly returns the damper onto the strings.
sentences.chinese: 在普通斷奏中，重力使止音器快速地回到弦上。
